title: Evidence-Based Learning Strategies for Online Science Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Science Knowledge and Experience with Online Learning Environments
context.additional_context: Digital device-provided environment for current practitioners, considering post-COVID-19 digital divide challenges

learning_goals: Learners establish and execute self-directed learning plans in online environments.
Learners develop blended learning modules for science subjects applying evidence-based design principles.
Learners design strategies to promote learner engagement using information system tools

Learners can analyze formative assessment data (e.g., quiz results, practical evaluation scores) within a week, propose three or more instructional design improvements (e.g., adjusting content difficulty, providing additional examples), and apply them to actual educational scenarios.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
